About Me

Welcome to my portfolio! I am a game developer working mainly on VR and AR using Unity engine. That said, I also have some experience with Unreal Engine 4 as well. This website contains my works from college classes and internship.

Youtube

Roller Ball

This is my first game ever. I had never coded or known any game engine before. This project helped me learn c# and applied it in a the simple roller ball game

unity c#

Runaway Knight

RunnawayKnight is a 2d endless run game. There are 3 types of obstacle and player have to response to these obstacle correctly. The game will drop coins for each monster killed and will progress faster the longer player stay alive. Player can then use coins to buy character upgrade and power ups such as, more HP, more attack range.

2d unity c# endless run

Painted Night

This is fps game which player have to sneak from the start position to the end. Player will encouter many monsters along the way and he or she will have to kill them using paintball guns which have various stats and special skills.

I learned a lot from this project. The intermediate c# subjects like delegate and event has been use extensively to create enemy behaviour. With gameplay mechanic like waypoint system and line of sight, making this project a nightmare to develop for the past me(who barely knew c# and unity). Nevertheless, Painted night is one of my personal favorite project because it was very enjoyable to play and I was very sastify with the result.

c# unity FPS game

Firework AR

My first AR project using Vuforia and Unity. Users could scan marker to show the floating village. Then they could tap the firework icon to spawn different types of firework in random position around the village.

AR c# Unity Vuforia

Escape from dream

This was a 2 person project. I worked with my artist friend. It is an indie game where player have to maneuver the character by creating floating papers and jump on it. The goal is to find keys to unlock the next map. if all key are found then the player could escape from nightmare.

My responsibility were, coding, level design, vfx and lighting

3d indie unity c#

Google VR Condo

This project used google Daydream SDK in unity. The goal was to let users see the condo room in their phone before they decide to buy it. Users could also modify furniture's textures by using gaze pointer to interact with furniture in the condo.

daydream vr mobile c# unity

MHS IT Valley

MHS IT Valley was a booth camp for high school student of Mae Hong Song province who want to study in the IT related major. I worked as a TA for game development class and as a lecturer for web development class.

booth camp unity web development TA

SPU Guide

SPU Guide is an indoor navigation guide app for my University that I prototyped with Placenote SDK.

AR IOS Placenote Unity C# Navigation

Laser Puzzle

Laser puzzle is a VR puzzle develop for OculusQuest. I use Unity's XR interaction toolkit for framework. The main mechanic is to put various token with different laser reaction on grid to guide the laser to the goal object.
SideQuest

VR Oculus Quest Unity XR Interaction toolkit C# Puzzle

Laser Puzzle

Laser puzzle is a VR puzzle develop for OculusQuest. I use Unity's XR interaction toolkit for framework. The main mechanic is to put various token with different laser reaction on grid to guide the laser to the goal object.

VR Oculus Quest Unity XR Interaction toolkit C# Puzzle

VR for ONDE

ONDE is a goverment organization. I helped them create VR app for playing 360 infographic videos that gave infomation about their technology campaigns.

VR Oculus Quest Unity C# 360 video

Save the Ocean

This is my friend Thesis. It was an AR app that aim to raise the awareness of ocean pollution created by human trashes. I coded all the systems and used Placenote SDK for persistent AR contents.

AR IOS Unity C# Placenote

True Forest

True forest is an VR application made for HTC-Vive with Unreal Engine 4. It take the player to the very realistic rain forest with various animals inside. Player counld see their information by looking at them. Finally, at the end of the road, there is a Saman-an extinct species, that player can pet.

In this project, my resposibility are project configuration, optimization, petting and looking system.

VR HTC-Vive Unreal Engine Blueprint

Escape Room VR

A VR EscapeRoom that has content center around bullying and finding the truth of the room owner. I created all the code and puzzles with the help of Unity's XR interaction toolkit framework.

VR Oculus Quest Unity C# EscapeRoom
